snippet.title: Globs · Official Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM: https://s.team/a/3219110
itch.io: https://yolwoocle.itch.io/globs
PLAY STORE: (TBA)
Ninesliced website: https://ninesliced.com 

Meet the size-changing Globs in this colorful puzzle game. Use the curious properties of their bodies at your advantage to solve a variety of levels, by using them to push each other or against walls, squeeze into tight gaps, grow to block holes, and many more surprises, all in a lively and expressive pixel art aesthetic.

The puzzles are designed to be approachable, but provide additional optional challenges for players wishing to put their puzzle-solving skills to the test.

- Over 30 levels
- A jazzy and upbeat soundtrack
- Expressive character animations
- Four different themed worlds each with an unique visual identity
